sorcer.util

Class SMTPSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.SMTPSession

  • public class SMTPSession
extends Object
    The SMTPSession class allows to send email messages using SmtpClient

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String[] bcc 
      String[] cc 
      String host 
      String[] message 
      String recipient 
      String sender 
      String subject 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SMTPSession()
      The default constructor will require you to set up all necessary information later
      SMTPSession(String host, String subject, String recipient, String sender, String[] message)
      Create a new SMTP session object.
      SMTPSession(String host, String subject, String recipient, String sender, String[] message, String[] cc)
      Create a new SMTP session object.
      SMTPSession(String host, String subject, String recipient, String sender, String[] message, String[] cc, String[] bcc)
      Create a new SMTP session object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String send()
      Send the message to the session recipient, controlContext and bcc recipients using the existing SMTPSession dataContext.
      String sendMessage()
      Send the message to the session recipient only using the SMTP protocol.
      String sendMessage(String recipient)
      Send the message to the argument recipient only using the existing SMTPSession dataContext.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SMTPSession

        public SMTPSession()
        The default constructor will require you to set up all necessary information later

      • SMTPSession

        public SMTPSession(String host,
           String subject,
           String recipient,
           String sender,
           String[] message)
        Create a new SMTP session object. The constructor will not send a message, this has to be invoked separately.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of the SMTP server host
        subject - the message subject
        recipient - the recipients email address
        sender - the senders email address
        message - the String array containing the message to be delivered

      • SMTPSession

        public SMTPSession(String host,
           String subject,
           String recipient,
           String sender,
           String[] message,
           String[] cc)
        Create a new SMTP session object. The constructor will not send a message, this has to be invoked separately.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of the SMTP server host
        subject - the message subject
        recipient - the recipients email address
        sender - the senders email address
        message - the String array containing the message to be delivered
        cc - the String array containing the recipients of carbon copy

      • SMTPSession

        public SMTPSession(String host,
           String subject,
           String recipient,
           String sender,
           String[] message,
           String[] cc,
           String[] bcc)
        Create a new SMTP session object. The constructor will not send a message, this has to be invoked separately.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of the SMTP server host
        subject - the message subject
        recipient - the recipients email address
        sender - the senders email address
        message - the String array containing the message to be delivered
        cc - the String array containing the recipients of carbon copy
        bcc - the String array containing the recipients of blind carbon copy

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public String sendMessage()
        Send the message to the session recipient only using the SMTP protocol.

      • sendMessage

        public String sendMessage(String recipient)
        Send the message to the argument recipient only using the existing SMTPSession dataContext.
        Parameters:
        recipient - the recipients email address

      • send

        public String send()
        Send the message to the session recipient, controlContext and bcc recipients using the existing SMTPSession dataContext.
